Meanings: محلی که در آن نقطه حفاری مایل می‌شود
بوش یا وسیله ای که به روتاری تیبل متصل شده و کلی از میان آن عبور می‌نماید و باعث انتقال چرخش به رشته حفاری می‌گردد

sided, suspended from the swivel through the rotary table and connected to the topmost joint of drill pipe to turn the drill stem as the rotary table turns. It has a bored passageway that permits fluid to be circulated into the drill stem and up the annulus, or vice versa
بوش یا وسیله ای که به روتاری تیبل متصل شده و کلی از میان آن عبور می‌نماید و باعث انتقال چرخش به رشته حفاری می‌گردد

A special device that, when fitted in to the master bushing, transmits torque to the kelly and simultaneously permits vertical movement of the kelly to make hole. It may be shaped to fit the rotary opening or have pins for transmitting torque. Also called the drive bushing. See also : Kelly
The hose on a Rotary Drilling Rig that conducts the Drilling Fluid from the Mud Pumps and Standpipe into the Swivel and Kelly, also called the Mud Hose or the Kelly Hose
خرطومی گل یا خرطومی دورانی جهت هدایت گل حفاری از درون پمپهای گل بداخل استند پایپ و هرز گرد و کلی
همچنین به لغت Mud Hose و Rotary Hose مراجعه شود
A Saver Sub that fits in the Drill Stem between the Kelly and Drill Pipe. The threads of the Drill Pipe mate with those of the Saver, minimizing wear on the Kelly
A slot in the edge of the barge hull of a jackup drilling unit over which the drilling rig is mounted and through which drilling tools are lowered and removed from the well being drilled

An entry of Water, Gas, Oil, or other Formation fluid into the Well, during drilling. It occurs because the pressure exerted by the column of drilling fluid is not great enough to overcome the pressure exerted by the fluids in the Formation drilled. If prompt action is not taken to control the Kick or Kill the Well, a blowout may occur
فوران چاه بتوسط گاز یا نفت موجود در مخزن را گویند
و در صنعت نفت و گاز به فوران چاه گویند
سیلان یا فوران آب یا گاز یا نفت از چاه در حال حفاری
To bring a well into production, usually by injecting gas.
in Workover operations, to swab a well to restore it to production.
to deviate a well from the vertical
KOP the depth in a vertical hole at which a deviated or slant hole is started; used in directional drilling
To bring a well into production, usually by injecting gas.
in Workover operations, to swab a well to restore it to production.
to deviate a well from the vertical
To overcome pressure in a Well by use of Mud or water so that surface connections may be removed
کشتن وزن گل حفاری یا در اصطلاح به پایین آوردن وزن گل حفاری گویند
کشتن وزن گل حفاری یا در اصطلاح به پایین آوردن وزن گل حفاری گویند
A kind of tank of filter used to separate Oil and Water
To bring a well into production, usually by injecting gas.
in Workover operations, to swab a well to restore it to production.
to deviate a well from the vertical
محلی که در آن نقطه حفاری مایل می‌شود
نقطه ای که از آنجا حفاری زاویه دار شروع می‌گردد
